title: Why does Jinx get full-damage AoE Crits when..
body:
Garen, who is the other champion in the game with AoE Critical Hit capabilities, gets 50% reduced critical damage, 25% less damage to minions, and has each individual hit instead of each tick apply the chance to critically strike? Once Jinx has her Attack Speed items she pretty much has an ungimped version of Judgment which can be used from 700 units away, why is that considered balanced when you intentionally make Garen's Judgment weaker for, what you guys claim, balance?

tl;dr nerf Jinx

EDIT: We've been compromised, this was actually a secret buff Garen thread trying to fish for support through joining the nerf Jinx circlejerk. I tried.
